user.description: Enter the connection details for your Apex Controller.

init.title: Manage Easyplus Roller Shutters
init.description: What do you want to do?

detect_cover_start.title: Start Detection
detect_cover_start.description:
Click 'Submit' and then IMMEDIATELY operate your roller shutter (briefly Open and briefly Close) via the wall switch.

The system will listen for activity for 10 seconds.

detect_confirm.title: Roller Shutter Found!
detect_confirm.description: Activity detected on relays {r1} and {r2}. Verify and assign a name.

detect_failed.title: Detection Failed
detect_failed.description: No or insufficient activity detected. Ensure you physically operate the switch while the wizard is running.

remove_cover.title: Remove Roller Shutter
remove_cover.description: Select the roller shutter you want to remove.

error.too_few_relays: Too few relays detected (<2). Operate both Open and Close.
